articles.description: Few things are as inevitable as the ball hitting the back of the net when Lionel Messi sizes up the target before executing a free-kick from 20 yards.
articles.title: Lionel Messi: Argentina star inspires Inter Miami to historic victory

articles.description: England's series against India, which begins on Friday, starts a era-defining 10-game spell for captain Ben Stokes and coach Brendon McCullum, writes chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England vs India: Why Test series is the time for England to win under Ben Stokes & Brendon McCullum

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler hits an opening-round 62 to tie the lead at the Travelers Championship, with Rory McIlroy just two shots behind on six under.
articles.title: Travelers Championship: Scottie Scheffler tied for lead with opening 62

articles.description: Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe is in hospital with gastroenteritis after missing their Club World Cup opener against Al-Hilal.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid forward in hospital with gastroenteritis

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz says he "does not know how I'm still standing here" after battling past Jaume Munar to reach the Queen's quarter-finals.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Carlos Alcaraz labours to victory over Jaume Munar in three hours 26 minutes to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: The baseball team is also expected to announce plans to assist immigrants who have been impacted by the raids in the city, US media report.
articles.title: Dodgers say immigration agents denied entry to Los Angeles stadium

articles.description: Manchester City are fined over £1m by the Premier League after repeatedly kicking-off late in matches last season.
articles.title: Manchester City fined £1m by the Premier League for kicking off late

articles.description: One person was taken to hospital on day two of the event, racecourse officials confirm.
articles.title: Royal Ascot 2025: Dozens fall ill on second day of event

articles.description: BBC Sport finds out more about the American businessman who is already involved with baseball, basketball, Formula 1, football, tennis and hockey.
articles.title: Who is prospective LA Lakers owner Mark Walter?

articles.description: Attendances have been low in the United States with the Club World Cup being treated as a dress rehearsal for next summer's World Cup.
articles.title: Club World Cup: More than 400,000 empty seats so far
